00001 def tree(ind, prob, params, random):
00002     p = ind.genome
00003     if random.random() < prob:
00004         ind.genome[0][1] = 1.0 - ind.genome[0][1]
00005         if not(ind.genome[0][1] == 0.0 or ind.genome[0][1] == 1.0):
00006             ind.genome[0][0] = 3 - ind.genome[0][0]
00007 
00008     for i in xrange(1, len(ind.genome)):
00009         for j in xrange(len(ind.genome[i])):
00010             if random.random() < prob:
00011                 ind.genome[i][j][1] = 1.0 - ind.genome[i][j][1]
